name: DON'T WaiT!
description:
This is DON'T WaiT! Control your player with arrow keys and jump with the space bar. Every 5 seconds the AI will take over and control your player for 5 seconds, but beware, it may not be very helpful! Avoid the orange lava and reach the white end point at the end of the level! Doors(brown ovals) can be opened by pressing E while in range. Have fun, and don't wait!

-Made for Wowie Jam 4.0
